translations.text: Wow, it’s a café! In this scene, you will learn how to order coffee and food, how to pay, and how to make conversations about the weather!
Let the barista know you're not ready to order yet
Now let’s learn how to order a coffee. There are so many different types of coffee in Australia, and so many ways of drinking them! I’ll show you
Lets find out what the barista recommends
Now you know different types of coffee. Let’s try to order different sizes. Can you find a large take-away cup?
Do you know you can choose how strong your coffee is? Let’s have a look! Can you find the coffee machine?
Don’t forget you can add different types of milk to your coffee. Can you find the milk jar?
We are almost there – one last thing, the sugar in your coffee! Can you find a sugar can for me please?
Well done! Let’s make sure you know how to pay, because money issues are big issues! Can you find a 20-dollar note?
It is usually more convenient paying by card. Can you find a bank card?
Oh, you can also have food in a café. What’s your favourite pastry? Let’s find a croissant – it is crescent shaped, like a moon!
Wonderful. Now you know everything about ordering a coffee – let's find the barista again!
Your freind enters the cafe, lets greet them
It is a gorgeous day today. Let’s practise talking about the weather.
The waiter is here, with your tasty coffee. Yay! Let’s ask Alice if you can get her a coffee.
While waiting, let’s continue chatting about your favourite weather.
What’s the weather like in your country?
Do you usually watch the weather forecast?
How nice it was to chat with your friend! You and Alice have to leave now. Alice wants to visit your house some day. Let’s give her the address.
